25. Sestertio tricies. Α milllon of sesterces is regularly expressed by ‘decies centena millia sestertium’ (Abbreviated gen. plur. for ‘sestertiorum.') But instead of this we commonly find the abbreviated expression, ‘decies ses· tertium’ (generally reversed, ⁸ sestertium decies'), and so on for larger numbers. ln such expressions ‘sestertium’ which is properly a gen. plur, is treated as a neuter subst. sing. Madvig, Suppl. a. From this imaginary subst. we here have 'sestertio,' abl. of price.
